commit.message:
mips.md (fixuns_truncdfsi2, [...]): Avoid automatic aggregate initialization.

	* mips.md (fixuns_truncdfsi2, fixuns_truncdfdi2,
	fixuns_truncsfsi2, fixuns_truncsfdi2): Avoid automatic aggregate
	initialization.

From-SVN: r54975

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+
+	* mips.md (fixuns_truncdfsi2, fixuns_truncdfdi2,
+	fixuns_truncsfsi2, fixuns_truncsfdi2): Avoid automatic aggregate
+	initialization.
